title: Bloomberg Markets: Bianco on Trump Scaling Back Regulation
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bianco on Trump Scaling Back Regulation
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jim Bianco President Bianco Research Discussing how a massive reduction in regulation is driving the Trump Trade.
